oval.message: Your Style Signature is Grace inspired by Lyra — a harmony of balanced proportions and timeless elegance. These designs will enhance your natural symmetry. Your facial energy matches with Rihanna and Julia Roberts.

round.message: Your Style Signature is Zen inspired by Orion — serene, balanced, and radiating quiet strength. These styles bring gentle focus to your features. Your facial energy matches with Selena Gomez and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.

square.message: Your Style Signature is Valor inspired by Vega — bold lines and confident geometry. These designs amplify your inner strength. Your facial energy matches with Jennifer Aniston and Demi Moore.

heart.message: Your Style Signature is Muse inspired by Atria — playful elegance with a touch of romance. These designs bring softness and allure to your look. Your facial energy matches with Naomi Campbell and Deepika Padukone.

diamond.message: Your Style Signature is Verve inspired by Altair — dynamic, captivating, and full of energy. These pieces accentuate your natural sparkle. Your facial energy matches with Jennifer Lopez and Scarlett Johansson.

rectangle.message: Your Style Signature is Poise inspired by Cygnus — graceful length and refined balance. These designs bring proportion and sophistication. Your facial energy matches with Katrina Kaif and Meryl Streep.
